summary: Comprehensive testing of Helpdesk Phase 2 (360-Degree Feedback + Survey Analytics) and Dynamic Dashboard Theming features. All backend APIs pass (7/7), all frontend UI tests pass. The 360 Feedback tab renders correctly with Q1 2026 Peer Review cycle showing 3 assignments. Assign Reviewers dialog, Feedback Analytics dialog, and Create Feedback Cycle dialog all work correctly. CelebrationBanner component renders birthday events and applies dynamic celebration-theme-birthday CSS class to the dashboard.
passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/helpdesk/feedback-cycles returns list with Q1 2026 Peer Review cycle
Backend: POST /api/helpdesk/feedback-cycles creates new feedback cycle successfully
Backend: GET /api/helpdesk/feedback-cycles/{cycle_id}/analytics returns analytics with summary, question_summaries, employee_summaries
Backend: GET /api/events/today returns today's celebration events
Backend: GET /api/events returns all employee events
Backend: GET /api/events/upcoming returns upcoming events in next 30 days
Backend: GET /api/helpdesk/surveys returns list of surveys
Frontend: Login page works with admin@shardahr.com credentials
Frontend: Dashboard page loads with data-testid='dashboard-page'
Frontend: CelebrationBanner component renders when today's events exist
Frontend: Dashboard applies 'celebration-theme celebration-theme-birthday' CSS class when birthday event exists
Frontend: 'Happy Birthday!' banner displays with amber gradient and message
Frontend: Dismiss button (X) present on celebration banner
Frontend: Helpdesk page loads with tab navigation
Frontend: 360 Feedback tab renders with FeedbackTab component (data-testid='feedback-tab')
Frontend: 360-Degree Feedback header visible
Frontend: Q1 2026 Peer Review cycle card shows with 'active' status badge
Frontend: Cycle card shows '3 assignments' and '0 completed' stats
Frontend: Assign button visible and clickable on active cycle
Frontend: Assign Reviewers dialog opens with employee selection
Frontend: Analytics button visible and clickable
Frontend: Feedback Analytics dialog opens with Category Scores (Communication, Teamwork, Leadership, Reliability, Problem Solving)
Frontend: Analytics shows Employee Rankings section
Frontend: New Cycle button (data-testid='create-feedback-cycle-btn') present for HR users
Frontend: Create Feedback Cycle dialog opens with form fields (Title, Description, Start/End Date, Anonymous toggle, Self-Nomination toggle)
Frontend: Surveys tab renders with 'Survey Management' heading and 'Create Survey' button
critical_code_review_comments: FeedbackTab.js correctly imports and uses data-testid='feedback-tab' for testability
CelebrationBanner.js correctly calls onThemeDetected callback to pass theme type to parent Dashboard
Dashboard.js correctly applies conditional CSS class using celebrationTheme state
celebration-theme CSS in index.css correctly defines themed variants for birthday, work_anniversary, marriage_anniversary, and custom events
API routes in helpdesk.py correctly implement all CRUD operations for feedback cycles
events.py correctly implements /today endpoint that matches events by month-day pattern (recurring annual events)

success_rate.backend: 100% (7 passed, 1 skipped - no surveys exist for detailed analytics test)

seed_data_creation: Created and deleted birthday event for EMP001 (evt_369c9523517b) on 2026-02-11 to test celebration banner. Event was cleaned up after testing.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Helpdesk Phase 2 (360 Feedback system) and Dynamic Dashboard Theming are fully functional. The 360 Feedback tab is the 4th tab in Helpdesk page. Existing feedback cycle 'Q1 2026 Peer Review' has cycle_id 'fc_cc5e82af2a1b' with 3 assignments assigned to Prashant Kumar Gupta. CelebrationBanner fetches from /api/events/today and calls onThemeDetected callback which Dashboard.js uses to apply celebration-theme-{event_type} CSS class. CSS theming is defined in index.css lines 634-695.

dynamic_dashboard_theming.work_anniversary_theme: not tested (no work anniversary events today)
dynamic_dashboard_theming.marriage_anniversary_theme: not tested (no marriage anniversary events today)
